item.title: Setup
item.description: Setup # The following articles are worth reading before you begin: https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/containers/de-mystifying-cluster-networking-for-amazon-eks-worker-nodes/ Create VPC # Begin my creating a VPC to launch worker nodes. Create worker nodes # See cloudformation template here. Join worker nodes to cluster # Update the aws-auth ConfigMap.
